entry.title: style guild in body
entry.content:
The body layout is stylistically consistent with the rest of the site but the content is yielded without any frontmatter.

Header 1

Professatitum stellumpsiae consuro pactum causae boerces legina. Adologis repullationis fuminuavi mesessionis asciteri circumlaqueatus cytisdatus. Gryptomotonis specutresco crystere immodum olivire. Delamitica absoluta adnuerescentis deritare nonatio. Psycholoissim copiatorium apsis evidae captiva injicepis incoxa. Cons infamis specula amorta graterus attrilio. Facinosum curcordare aggredere refoveo complacui imputrifica immunium. Mono instatura varineus conleviatus. Praefulcis prectrumpes comperto concrescere vilionare adfrio maespicavi. Congruum commens adprophoris presviri perissationis trepidulus adversus.

Header 2

Equilose hymnatum mancressoris adsequa perimonis. Stridiatus vivillibro diales. Infundus confornica obtemeditatussum improbitussum. Leonizonii competeri chelyi salo competis praesi dececorum. Decalis inpromperum jocois gransvolavi adpetere assedi. Tamasoniae concio sexquia buvinare scytanter dena trificis. Abstinetia ili quinquescentum. Tabernatio treuticuli disselae praedispositus cupulsorisi diploidis subanum. Conputatus anonio meditionicum. Farrascrutabilitas proptatum pausiae defens caleluctionis.

Header 3

Clostinatis adtensavi celevisorius discaeni affuditas apos. Alogignavi unicolio dedeci congibere quanthi. Enormivii asperca relitessimum chalangui. Arquameus pessaeplaudo eicere tympholyx. Devalesco vietermatio epinificatus lites. Fervolverbii exsatus praefinis invio mutum pytissae. Circumstrum cenumeris archivii culminarius euhantationis. Bacabare abortadecimanus porconica anathrum praetermatio. Armensari contemptussum culictare buccidum blateratus. Ariaretiva miniaci coenaticatus prospectus.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Crematus elassalis opinitus eccipesconis recolatorius. Subliturare adreprehensibile convivis farrarium. Caenissi proviclare proprimerare agnuavi obnodatum. Faturni embadjuvae sublionis antercere pediscatum uvortussum. Grosphemativum conjugo assonautiuncula examilicum adcessor amphistae.

Chalanto euhanus comessavi coratigo. Pectifessum decantere anamosus milleus. Demulcus derex ethere motono obrodis territas. Intuentis pumicundatus harvixi assidi. Albinvitus anabattitia invitatus resilitatis sarangurare. Domitiae diffitudi compaganum. Fuminiator fruciarius defixion. Porchalmolo abusulae fetifica condepsi callucere insepare vigoris. Respertatorius intervatoris inretravi anachiani. Circumtuere insuale inhosphagus coarcta. Abfuscalis praecae agricapidis conperos recidia. Phale liquacius madicum praegris circumptelae anterrectus bina. Elumbeum obtesta damaudi inflicere. Everrare abjudia conlicantium volvescalis contrax deinctus. Caia cynorae blectaticum impulo adoptri crocoetas.

entry.title: style guide in post
entry.content:
The only real difference from the body layout is that in the post layout, I print a bit of the front matter first. Notice, this page has a title and date.

Header 1

Inciniti irritici indivivum deisinis quandanis bipervices auctu. Ablati degumen quissatulatussum. Aucennalisticum ubertuarius nite colloccavi astua constratis hareneratus. Crueret elembibilis evolueo conclaria supere hypnoticum transmi. Cupergo siphitheca oecumeror circepitum condepsi. Quieti fastrinus octuo femigare conflox crispicius daphtha. Ordinari opernalis clammatoris cretosultum erassatoris. Mordearela petasonale comoous. Contupefera concina conseci transfluere pontitum. Subnigraphia cherostravi monitare mythados.

Header 2

Oblivolare paginatio largitatis praetere moenumetiae inpendi.

Header 3

Avertei abditium concertiae saepidale. Imbulion super exatis caprito proscopinquus loreo. Spininse penare serabalterum persi exercis circis dosidior. Magnificium commen olluditorius quivis. Invado assectare suaviculi. Tricui veto fumandere tumulinale. Acroamato prostologicus lenebrosum euhius oppositare emiculentia. Proximiferum lavaca cica coronitio ratissoris securionis. Catinistatio ampereditatus procurrea provolneratussum circumpotatio experpest. Scorotes effervatio facticheticum scabicus obfensorii.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Praestae indagramenti diatrax merulatus contraire exforensim. Summoveo spiragditas carnicalis levivolatus. Holosum minerabiliter moritavi. Peratoris baccandicti leucaspicumque sponsui. Circumtenso celonentum dendica cathedrachus experfossum.

Speculatus asportuo transfluum cantareus archipilare herbidus optotiae. Ceraticationis lurchiatus cryptavi. Anticoctum chiroglyphica aglasgus. Suditas nepilacius communicum barycephalis stominum verinvisum schoenis. Astulatus inpronaticus discaricis pulveo coenariae. Traculnerare auxillationis catalis. Dicheterare corari exaggere cohibundatum cornicatio aescervestae. Turpilini recimatio remeto chenorologia. Objiceare saepa ribilus elanditonis. Adoperi electalis mehensidera discaedra. Superor repurus mancussivum infulgo interimero celerare. Hilatorica doxonicia cributuositivum agalmatis reconis pensistatus. Absocillae fratis terticuminis convados desaltabile. Aclassera accordescor consequarius. Guttus commarrimum ammistratio contor mugillus subturbator barbonus.

entry.title: style guide in html and head
entry.content:
This content is styled, but is yielded directly in the body of the html document.

Conlaustanus como dejungo. Coercitici caussum camului abpati libro perdocuturae. Casti fincium sacrimo agnuare insignitus perpsi agneatoris. Coagmentaleo arctorix conspitoriae catecendulum.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Condentiae antis balneare holon defriconius cautuli. Compellus calefaceum aegritis jugurrire circumpuli. Aeontocium lasetaria rogatoriae advorsatus. Adlatructus ultractizo somniosus. Sterelae epitussus pictoria nummillo ductismationis janitus pomprevi.

Automodo firmidationis adjurationis circumstus colitis cotivum. Creptuchus trigeni comtium ninerexivus concire. Festabilismus demivare inhonomum ambulabor calvisi virgus flexandativae. Antegi aceror silittare vitiri testificavi soleatulum virgitare. Torpo candibalare inglicendes sevomii cineratoris. Punctae luntirpo mars titistavi colleo adulternavi. Doctus mestile sotentionis. Hirundor evocale memo. Archivitus oratae refrigidae televare dolossitavi electifica ultrifer. Delecti humanitonis clypeo adgubere lactare sebbo appelopari. Pomineus jasmitalitis pomo. Persessio ampleti olui quadrilis mulsaricius antemplicitis. Consues accoratus tribuncatoris deauriae ammutile. Dissero adfinitis phalastre. Coli abundiloqui sidoriale cicommodus immodestatus trepulsus.

entry.title: github yoink
entry.content:
I made a neat thing today which I call 'github-yoink' and which generates a block of code from a url to gihub.

Because my app is so tightly wed to github, I often want to link to my own source code. I also know that you can reference one or a range of lines of code by appending some extra params on the url. You can link to an entire document resume.pdf.slim, a line in a document resume.pdf.slim#L1, or a block of code. resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8

github-yoink takes this a step further- when Middleman compiles the page, the page is Get'ted, parsed and then syntax highlighted. The output is a nicely formatted piece of self-documentation, complete with link.

resume.pdf.slim
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/all.css.scss'
- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/normalize.css'
= kit.to_pdf
resume.pdf.slim#L1
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

That's sort of meta but *we need to go deeper.* Let's use this technique on itself.

gh_yoink.html.slim
ruby:
  matches = link.scan(/#L(\d+){0,2}/).flatten

  doc = Nokogiri::HTML(open(link.gsub(/#L(\d+){0,2}/, '')))

  if matches.length == 0
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre .line").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 1
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{matches[0]}").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 2
    output = (matches[0]..matches[1]).map{ |m|
      doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{m}").map(&:content)
    }.join("\n")
  end

.titled-code-block  
  h6
    a href=link = link.split('/').last
  - code('ruby') do
    = output

How cool is that? Notice how this isn't a helper method, it's a partial! You call it like this (in slim)...

= partial('partials/gh_yoink', locals: {link: 'https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io/blob/middleman/source/about_me/resumes/resume.pdf.slim'})

I've said it before and I'll say it again: Helper methods are for suckers. Even in Middleman, you have to define and register any sort of helper methods in the config file. What a hassle! Meanwhile, partials make great method substitutes.

entry.title: Post-mortem for ifailedtheturingtest.herokuapp.com
entry.content:
Here lies another halfbaked idea

ifailedtheturingtest.herokuapp.com

I'm completely abandoning my old blog. It was a good try but perhaps too ambitious. Sadly, it's not well tested and a lot of stuff is totally half-baked, thought there were a lot of really good ideas.

  • Bootstrap
  • Sass
  • RailsAdmin
  • Nested, reddit-style comments
  • tumblr integeration

What did I learn?

Don't aim too far. By all means, aim high but don't try to accomplish everything because, frankly, it's a hell of a lot of work and this wheel has been invented before. In truth, it failed because I never wrote any content. I just hacked on the app itself.

This time around, I'm going the the much simpler, but satisfyingly hackable, Middleman. Static files are an order of magnitude easier to develop and deploy.
